traits.name: Skilled Tracker
traits.desc: The centaur has advantage on Wisdom (Survival) checks while in the forest.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The centaur makes two attacks: one with its longsword and one with its hooves or two with its longbow.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.
